title: LF people to play LoL with (Ranked)
body:
Age: 18+  
Oce: TjayBrah
Divison: Silver V 
Love playing : Nidalee, ezreal, thresh, blitz , swain, rumble , trundle

Mainly just want people who want to have fun , def no ragers. Happy to give advice, and just enjoy the game even when losing. (Also if you play PS4 as well that's a big plus) 

Add me or leave a post etc.

replies.body: Yo my username is SnapperScalez I added you on league.
